statements.sql: select `posts`.*, (select count(*) from `likes` where `posts`.`id` = `likes`.`likeable_id` and `likes`.`likeable_type` = 'App\\Models\\Post') as `likes_count`, (select count(*) from `comments` where `posts`.`id` = `comments`.`post_id`) as `comments_count`, (select count(*) from `shares` where `posts`.`id` = `shares`.`post_id`) as `shares_count` from `posts` where `posts`.`id` = 99991 limit 1

explain.query: select `posts`.*, (select count(*) from `likes` where `posts`.`id` = `likes`.`likeable_id` and `likes`.`likeable_type` = ?) as `likes_count`, (select count(*) from `comments` where `posts`.`id` = `comments`.`post_id`) as `comments_count`, (select count(*) from `shares` where `posts`.`id` = `shares`.`post_id`) as `shares_count` from `posts` where `posts`.`id` = ? limit 1
